Player History
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $1,748,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/7/1985, off Scott Garrelts (NYG)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/10/1985, off Steve Crawford (BOS)...
Hit for the cycle against Boston on 4/10/1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/1985, hitting .522 with 3 HR, 4 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1985, hitting .398 with 7 HR, 26 RBI...
Traded from Toronto to Chicago on 7/31/1985 (Going to CHC: 1B Cecil Fielder, 3B Mike Sharperson, CF Ruppert Jones. Going to TOR: P Floyd Bannister, P Ron Davis, CF Keith Moreland)...
Signed as a free agent by New York (M) on 2/23/1986 to a 3-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Released by New York (M) on 3/4/1986...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 3/4/1986 to a 1-year deal worth $6,287,500 per year...
Released by Chicago on 3/4/1986...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 3/4/1986 to a 1-year deal worth $2,184,000 per year...
10/16/1986: Signed a contract extension with Pittsburgh, $2,800,000 per year, for 3 years.
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles on 7/12/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/1988, hitting .450 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
